VRDisplayIsConnected.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The isConnected read-only property of the interface returns a boolean value indicating whether the VRDisplay is connected to the computer.

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para:
-WebVR API homepage
- â€” demos, downloads, and other resources from the Mozilla VR team.

VRDisplayIsConnected.value: A boolean value; true means the display is connected; false means it isn't.
